text: The Oxfordshire Stakes was a greyhound competition held at Oxford Stadium until it closed. It was inaugurated in 1964 and was a major event in the 1960s and 1970s. It changed its name to the Oxfordshire Trophy in 1982 but reverted to its original name in 2008. ==Past winners== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ |- !width=50|Year !width=180|Winner
